Publicis Media | Senior Developer | New York, NY | Full Time | ONSITE | $120-180k

We are an adtech agency that operates autonomously as part of a large global media holding company. Our domain is complex and interesting, involving market segments and exchange bidding. I'm helping hire senior developers for the product team. Our focus is on providing a client facing frontend and supporting backend APIs. We pay competitive salaries in NYC and have plenty of mentorship and leadership opportunities for senior developers. Our tech stack is Ruby on Rails with Angular/TypeScript.

Reach out to me directly, sandy.vanderbleek@publicismedia.com
